00077                 if( $this->isFinal() )
00078                 {
00079                         $strCode .= " final ";
00080                 }

00083                         $strCode .= " private ";

00092                 }
00093                 if( $this->isStatic() )
00094                 {
00095                         $strCode .= " static ";
00096                 }

00105         protected function createParametersCode()
00106         {
00107                 $strCode = "";
00108                 $arrParameters = $this->getParameters();
00109                 $arrParametersName = array();
00110 
00111                 foreach(  $arrParameters as $objParameter )
00112                 {
